reviews.text: Don't choose this hotel by looking at its website. It's just a matter of luck getting one of THE FEW rooms they have rennovated and they show you on internet. When me and my girlfirend arrived we were given an old, dark and small room at the ground floor not even in the main building ( you have to go out to get to the annex building). I complained with the receptionist saying that we had to stay there for a few days, had big suitcases and the room he gave us was not the one we were expecting but he didn't want to change us the room. Reason: fully booked. Weird because we were with a big group and the big part of it was arriving the day after us. At the time we arrived the hotel seemed empty. He just didn't want to spend time in making changes in his system!!! If we were on our own we surely would have changed hotel!!!!
reviews.title: Fake rennovated hotel
Almost Ripped Off
reviews.text: I stayed here for two nights..Hotel is fine.

But, one of the clerks tried to steal my credit card information. He called my room and said he was going to throw me out at midnight if I did not give him the code from my card. Not being a French speaker I was in distress. Luckily, I have Belgian friends who called the hotel and the clerk backed off.
reviews.title: good value, location but rooms lack consistency

likes.liked: — large, newly renovated rooms in the main building
likes.disliked: — rooms in the detached building were old and very small

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: NEXT MORNING I TRIED TO HAVE SOMETHING DONE BUT NO ONE CARED.
reviews.title: great value for money
